name: Graveyard Keeper (itch) (egoludens)
description:
Heroes put the Evil Sorcerer to rest and moved on to other great adventures and heroic deeds. Meanwhile Evil Sorcerer is buried on the local graveyard. But he's not really dead. He wants out and now raises bodies from the graveyard to free him.

Now the task of holding the line falls to the hands of the Graveyard Keeper. He must hold the Evil Sorcerer buried by holding his neighbours buried while still doing his usual work. Two weeks until the full moon.
